Title: Lessons from History
Description:
The Thunder King was a vicious Emperor and with the Zandalari at his side he was unstoppable. His return would surely return this land to turmoil and misery.

You must locate his remains and take them somewhere safe. The Tablet of Thunder should help you figure out how to access his tomb.
ObjectivesText: Read the Tablet of Thunder in the Tomb of Conquerors.
RewardText: They will need to move the remains to a secure location. We must go after them!
